items.description:
Happy Friday!

Is it just me, or is the community preferring to create videos over blog posts? This edition is jam-packed full of videos to check out. I would highly recommend checking out the MAUI Community Standup to keep up to date with all the great MAUI stuff heading our way.

Here in Melbourne we are locked down (again) so I guess I'm going to have plenty of time to catch up on video content in between bouts of home-schooling my kids ;-)

Anyway, have a magical weekend.

❤

Kym

items.title: Customizing Controls with Handlers in .NET MAUI
items.description:
UI controls in .NET MAUI are rendered via handlers, lightweight classes that map properties and features to bite-sized implementations. In this video we will learn how to override the default .NET MAUI handler behavior to tweak the native controls to our liking. Spoiler alert: much easier than Xamarin.Forms Custom Renderers!

Customizing Controls with Handlers in .NET MAUI by Gerald Versluis

items.title: Null Pointers 64: Coding Conventions
items.description:
We quickly touch upon Visual Studio 2022 for Mac, which is in private preview at the time of recording. Then we face the question as old as time. How can you work with different people on one code base without starting flamewars whenever you review pull requests? We discuss our experiences, helpers and mindsets in this episode.
